name: Warrior Chess HD
description:
Welcome to the world of Warrior Chess!. Play chess in this glorious high resolution 3D world. Themed in the year 1066 and based on the Battle of Hastings. Are you a true chess warrior?

Game Features Include:

· Interactive 3D board, rotate, zoom and view & play from any angle
· 3D & 2D chess pieces
· 2 Player board rotation. Place the iPad on the table like a real chess board!
· 50 AI difficulty settings, from easy to difficult.
· Timed games from 5 minutes to 99 minutes.
· Turn the interactive camera on or off
· Stuck?, use the move hint generation feature.
· Undo & Redo moves, even after Checkmate.
· Show all the moves for the current game
· Using Undo/Redo, walk through all the moves.
· Restart a completed game from any previous point and play again.
· Save & Load games, to be replayed / analysed or finished later
· "How to Play" chess tutorial showing all the moves
· Support for "Castling", "En Passant" and "Pawn Promotion"
· Retina rendering support
